ZmyHeo_review_text: Look and feel in hand is same as G85. Performance and rear camera are improved for sure. But heat is felt in hand while using camera. Front camera's Portrait Mode has dynamic range handling issue, no touch to focus or exposure control till now. Battery drains fast in 4G but stable in 5G. All these can be resolved via OTA update. Providing no back cover and screen protector is surely a draw back.
